title: Distance Science Project-Based Learning Using Mixed Media

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and fundamental proficiency in digital devices (smartphones)
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Learners are working professionals performing job-integrated projects

learning_goals: Learners can design and conduct science experiment projects utilizing blended media (web/mobile/print) in remote environments.
Learners can document the scientific problem-solving process collaboratively with peers using PBL (Project-Based Learning) methods in a mobile-based format.
Learners can visually represent and share science project results using smartphone-optimized tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
